amendment.description: Amendment sought to add the effect on clean energy jobs and clean energy companies, including those that export clean energy technology, to the items to be considered in the analyses required by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-213 to add the effect on clean energy jobs and clean energy companies, including those that export clean energy technology, to the items to be considered in the analyses required by the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 229 (Roll no. 729).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 229 (Roll no. 729).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. McNerney.
